doc.after: Public transportation in Miami is operated by Miami Dade Transit and SFRTA and includes commuter rail Tri Rail heavy rail rapid transit Metrorail an elevated people mover Metromover and buses Metrobus Miami has Florida s highest transit ridership as about 17 of Miamians use transit on a daily basis 108
